alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 5:28PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON... SOUTHEASTERN FORT BEND...CENTRAL BRAZORIA AND CENTRAL MATAGORDA COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CST... At 527 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Van Vleck, or 7 miles east of Bay City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Jackson, Angleton, Bay City, Palacios, West Columbia, Sweeny, South Texas Nuclear Plant, Richwood, Brazoria, Danbury, Holiday Lakes, Bailey`s Prairie, Bonney, Wild Peach Village, Markham, Van Vleck, and Wadsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda
